Bash(echo "

## Dev Agent Record

### Agent Model Used
Claude Sonnet 4.5 (claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929) - BMad Orchestrator coordinating implementation

### Implementation Summary
Completely refactored Contact Page with brand-compliant design, enhanced UX with office hours and parking information, integrated Google Maps, and added clickable contact links.

### Completed Tasks
- [x] ContactPage component fully refactored with brand colors
- [x] Contact information cards with icon containers
- [x] Google Maps iframe integration
- [x] Office hours section added (Clock icon)
- [x] Parking information card added
- [x] Clickable phone and email links (tel: and mailto:)
- [x] Responsive two-column layout (stacks on mobile)
- [x] Call-to-action button for appointment booking

### Files Modified
- \`client/src/pages/ContactPage.jsx\` - Complete redesign with brand compliance

### Acceptance Criteria Status
All 5 acceptance criteria met and verified. Ready for QA testing.")

Bash(echo "

## Dev Agent Record

### Agent Model Used
Claude Sonnet 4.5 (claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929) - BMad Orchestrator coordinating implementation

### Implementation Summary
Completely refactored Header and Footer components with full brand compliance, mobile-responsive hamburger menu, active page highlighting, and enhanced footer with quick links and contact information.

### Completed Tasks
- [x] Header component refactored with brand colors
- [x] NavLink active state highlighting implemented (light blue background)
- [x] Mobile hamburger menu fully functional with smooth transitions
- [x] Footer redesigned with 3-column layout (About, Quick Links, Contact)
- [x] Brand-compliant colors throughout: text-brand-DEFAULT, bg-brand-light, text-brand-dark
- [x] Responsive navigation: desktop horizontal, mobile dropdown
- [x] Logo and clinic name in header with brand teal color
- [x] Contact information with clickable phone/email links in footer
- [x] Accessibility: aria-labels, sr-only text, proper button attributes

### Files Modified
- \`client/src/components/Header.jsx\` - Brand color refactoring, mobile menu, active states
- \`client/src/components/Footer.jsx\` - Complete redesign with 3-column layout, contact info

### Key Features Implemented
**Header:**
- White background with brand-light border
- Desktop: horizontal nav with rounded hover states
- Mobile: hamburger menu with Menu/X icons from Lucide
- Active page: bg-brand-light with text-brand-dark
- Smooth transitions on all interactive elements

**Footer:**
- bg-brand-light with brand-DEFAULT border
- Three columns: About, Quick Links, Contact Info
- Icons for phone, email, location (Lucide React)
- Clickable phone (tel:) and email (mailto:) links
- Copyright notice with current year
- Fully responsive: 3 cols desktop, 1 col mobile

### Acceptance Criteria Status
All 6 acceptance criteria met and verified. Ready for QA testing.")

Bash(do echo "
--- Testing $role ---" curl -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/auth/login -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{""username"":""$role"",""password"":""password123""}" -w "
HTTP Status: %{http_code}
" -s)
Bash(do echo "Testing login: $user" curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/auth/login -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{""username"":""$user"",""password"":""antimize""}")
